title: Tax breaks for foreign data centres only if guardrails are put in place

title: Rs 20 Cr CoE in AI sanctioned to strengthen education, governance and startups: CM
description: WhatsApp-based platform planned to make services more accessible Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Feb 6: Chief Minister Omar Abdullah today announced a series of digital initiatives aimed at strengthening governance, cyber security and service delivery in Jammu and Kashmir, including the sanctioning of a Centre of Excellence (CoE) in Artificial Intelligence (AI) with an outlay of Rs 20 crore over four years.
